title: Sundar Pichai - Wikipedia
snippet: Pichai was selected to become the next CEO of Google on August 10, 2015, after previously being appointed chief product officer by then CEO Larry Page. On October 24, 2015, he stepped into the new position at the completion of the formation of Alphabet Inc., the new holding company for the ...

title: Sundar Pichai
snippet: He’s also responsible for two of the most important platforms in computing today—Android and Chrome. After years of working closely with Google’s co-founders, Larry Page and Sergey Brin, Sundar became Google’s CEO in August 2015.

title: Sundar Pichai CEO, Google and Alphabet
snippet: In December 2019, in addition to his role as CEO of Google, Sundar became the CEO of Google’s parent

title: Sundar Pichai
snippet: Sundar Pichai is CEO of Google parent Alphabet, a position he has held since 2019, when he was tapped to replace Google cofounder Larry Page.

title: Sundar Pichai | Biography, Google, & Facts | Britannica Money
snippet: He worked on the Google Toolbar, which allowed Microsoft Internet Explorer and Mozilla Firefox browser users to easily access Google’s search feature. Sundar Pichai became CEO of Google in 2015 and CEO of Alphabet in 2019.
